title: Kristen McMenamy Joins Instagram in Perfect Supermodel Style
summary:
What makes a model a supermodel?
Is it being recognized on the street by paparazzi, or defining the look of a specific decade?
If you ask us, part of the equation is possessing the strength of personality and style that shines through no matter the setting.
So while it might come as a welcome surprise to see her join Instagram this week, the sheer fabulousness of her debut felt a little less unexpected.
Now that’s the kind of detail only a supermodel would add.
paragraphs: What makes a model a supermodel? Is it being recognized on the street by paparazzi, or defining the look of a specific decade? Is it simply the ability to command millions of dollars for a campaign, or, as Linda Evangelista famously put it once, not getting out of bed for less than $10,000 a day? If you ask us, part of the equation is possessing the strength of personality and style that shines through no matter the setting.

It’s a quality the legendary Kristen McMenamy has in spades. Whether it’s the minimal, grunge-inflected looks of her breakout era in the ’90s, the romantic Grecian draping of her unforgettable Karl Lagerfeld-designed wedding dress, or the gothic glamour of her red carpet looks by the likes of Alexander McQueen and Valentino, McMenamy’s enduring appeal is in no small part a result of her inimitable personal style.

So while it might come as a welcome surprise to see her join Instagram this week, the sheer fabulousness of her debut felt a little less unexpected. Sharing a snap of herself sitting in the back of a London taxi, winkingly captioned “don’t know where I’m going!”, the model wore a billowing black coat over a neon pink long-sleeve tee and yellow leggings, teamed with red sunglasses and a matching pair of Balenciaga knife boots to lend the look her signature edge.
The final touch? A trompe l’oeil velvet Prada cahier bag from the brand’s Fellini-inspired fall 2017 collection. Now that’s the kind of detail only a supermodel would add.
